summary: A Practice Crossbow which does no damage and does not cause aggression.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard.

Made this as a companion mod for Practice Bow (which does not requre Dawnguard) as a few people on nexus were asking about it.

Available from Drunken Huntsman and Sorine Jurard, (intentionally only one available from Drunken Huntsman as this is a relatively new weapon to Skyrim).  Practice Bolts are available from these guys too.

Now included is a Practice Dwarven Crossbow and Practice Dragonbone Bow, Practice Bolts now do 0.0001 damage in order to make a sound when hitting live targets they still don\'t cause aggression if used with a practice crossbow.

Allows you to deliver poisons without causing aggression.

My 2nd mod, enjoy!

Nexus Link
Practice Bow - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25286/
author: Vardath
